author: SanghyunKo
body:
Some IB test workflows in 10_6_X still have prelegacy modifiers and want to access the obsolete data files. This should fix the IB test failure seen in cms-sw/cmssw#46552 and cms-sw/cmssw#46595.

(Note: the tests will pass, but now it's the user's responsibility not to access the obsolete data files - in principle very few analysis teams want to re-nano with 10_6_X)
title: Revive back obsolete scale and smearing data files for 10_6_X backport
